Method Detail

read

public static VirusScanConfig read(java.lang.String dir,
                                   java.lang.String filenameAndExtension)
                            throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
This static method is leveraged to construct new VirusScanConfig instances. VirusScanConfig instances are comprised in part based on data retrieved from a corresponding HDA file stored on disk.

Parameters:
dir - virus scan data directory
filenameAndExtension - full name/extension of hda file to read
Returns:
new VirusScanConfig instance
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException

updateDataBinder

public intradoc.data.DataBinder updateDataBinder(intradoc.data.DataBinder binder)
Returns a new DataBinder instance based on the current field values of the VirusScanConfig instance.

Returns:
DataBinder based on the current field values

write

public void write()
           throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Writes a DataBinder based on the current field values of the VirusScanConfig instance to disk. The directory name and filename specified at original time of construction of the VirusScanConfig instance determine the the output file.

Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of this VirusScanConfig instance. This is essentially the filename of the HDA file used to construct this instance minus the extension component. This property is also connected to the CONFIG_ID property in the DataBinder.

Returns:
name of the configuration

getDirectory

public java.lang.String getDirectory()
Returns the virus scan data directory from which the HDA file was initially read to construct the VirusScanConfig instance.

Returns:
virus scan data directory associated with the configuration

getFilenameAndExtension

public java.lang.String getFilenameAndExtension()
Returns the full name/extension of the HDA file used to construct the VirusScanConfig instance.

Returns:
full name/extension of hda file associated with this configuration

getScannerConfig

public java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> getScannerConfig()
Returns the map of scanner config.

Returns:
map of scanner config

setMode

public void setMode(java.lang.String mode)
             throws intradoc.common.ServiceException
Sets the virus scan mode for this scanner config.

Parameters:
mode - The virus scan mode.
Throws:
intradoc.common.ServiceException
